Rectangle Profile Definition
============================



```
concept {
    IfcRectangleProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcRectangleProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcRectangleProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D
    IfcRectangleProfileDef:XDim -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcRectangleProfileDef:YDim -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint
    IfcAxis2Placement2D:RefDirection -> IfcDirection
}
```
